Title: Weight
Writer: Graham Yost (developed for television by), Taylor Elmore, Keith Schreier, Elmore Leonard (short story "Fire in the Hole")
Actors: Timothy Olyphant, Nick Searcy, Jere Burns, Joelle Carter
Plot: Dewey tries to turn his latest score into a ticket out of Harlan. Ava decides to survive on her own in Trambull. Raylan follows Boyd's heroin trail to the Crowes and is introduced to the 21-foot rule.
